程序包的使用
com.whaleal.mars.task

  • 使用com.whaleal.mars.task的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.whaleal.mars.task  
    com.whaleal.mars.task.support  
  • com.whaleal.mars.task使用的com.whaleal.mars.task中的类 
    类和说明
    AsyncListenableTaskExecutor
    Extension of the AsyncTaskExecutor interface, adding the capability to submit tasks for ListenableFutures.
    AsyncTaskExecutor
    Extended interface for asynchronous TaskExecutor implementations, offering an overloaded AsyncTaskExecutor.execute(Runnable, long) variant with a start timeout parameter as well support for Callable.
    FailureCallback 
    ListenableFuture
    Extend Future with the capability to accept completion callbacks.
    ListenableFutureCallback 
    ListenableFutureCallbackRegistry
    Helper class for ListenableFuture implementations that maintains a of success and failure callbacks and helps to notify them.
    ListenableFutureCallbackRegistry.State 
    SimpleAsyncTaskExecutor.ConcurrencyThrottleAdapter
    Subclass of the general ConcurrencyThrottleSupport class, making beforeAccess() and afterAccess() visible to the surrounding class.
    SuccessCallback 
    TaskDecorator 
    TaskExecutor
    Simple task executor interface that abstracts the execution of a Runnable.
    TaskRejectedException 
  • com.whaleal.mars.task.support使用的com.whaleal.mars.task中的类 
    类和说明
    AsyncListenableTaskExecutor
    Extension of the AsyncTaskExecutor interface, adding the capability to submit tasks for ListenableFutures.
    AsyncTaskExecutor
    Extended interface for asynchronous TaskExecutor implementations, offering an overloaded AsyncTaskExecutor.execute(Runnable, long) variant with a start timeout parameter as well support for Callable.
    ListenableFuture
    Extend Future with the capability to accept completion callbacks.
    TaskDecorator 
    TaskExecutor
    Simple task executor interface that abstracts the execution of a Runnable.
